title: Opinion on novel coronavirus COVID-19 as a health issue India 2020
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Staying alert and taking precautions and lowest at Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
There is a difference of 69.0 between the maximum Response Staying alert and taking precautions and minimum Response Don't know much about coronavirus.
